body.p: Spring Valley Mrs. A. Betthauser accompanied Misses Grace Cassels and Ollie Swanson of Sparta to Rochester, Minnesota Sunday to see Miss Catherine Betthauser who is convalescing there. Mr. La Verne Komiskey has gone to southern Iowa where he was called to his railroad work. Mrs. John Betthauser and daughter spent Saturday night with the former’s sister, Mrs. A. H. Schultz. Mr. and Mrs. Arthur Rehberg were Sunday afternoon visitors at the Lawrence Hart home. Mr. Pete Gasper is sawing wood in this valley. Mr. and Mrs. John Betthauser and family were Sunday guests or Mrs. Anna Gilson in Tomah. Mr. Martin Komiskey and won Harold and Mr. John Gerke were Sparta callers Thursday of last week. Mr. and MRs. Fred Roscovious and so spent Tuesday at Lawrence Hart’s.
